alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 7:13AM MST until November 22 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of a trace to 0.03. * WHERE...Marias Pass, Polebridge, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, Polson, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Flathead Valley, Essex, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Mission Valley, Bad Rock Canyon, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Flathead Lake, and Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing rain is occurring and is expected to create slick conditions for the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
